description: Supports the emotional well-being of group members in difficult times, and celebrates their successes

signals: Understand the vision and KPIs of your Squad
Understands the vision and business KPIs of you Tribe, and drive your Squads KPIs to completion
Mentorship: the ability to successfully transfer knowledge
Able to negotiate with PM motivation for technical tasks and drive them to completion
examples: You resolve technical conflicts within the Squad based on logical reasoning
You drive Tribes KPIs to completion

signals: Fosters a culture of documentation and knowledge sharing across the organization and actively demonstrates these behaviors
Fosters collaboration and knowledge sharing between teams
Proactive role in attracting strong talent
examples: Participates in defining hiring standards for other engineers

signals: Raises awareness of engineering achievements and challenges to group management (Presenting achievements of the team and the motivation in all-hands or company-wide tech-talks)
Help represent DH externally to attract talent --> The work/blogs/events and respect you have in the tech community attracts talented people to choose to join DH
Thinks backward from the customer --> You put the customers/users first you proactively come up with ideas to improve their lives
examples: You dig deeper into incidents and you solve recurring issues from the root-cause and own it
You understand the team's tech stack limitations and you can foresee and come up with better solutions/infra solutions according to expected growth
You see bottlenecks in the technical and you proactively find ways to change/inspire people to follow

signals: Able to lead engineers across teams without formal authority
Global knowledge sharing proactively helps teams across the world to get better
Strong interviewing skills and ability to attract and excite the best candidates --> You interview IC5+ people and can assess properly their skillset and hire the best people available
You coach and train interviewers on how to interview IC3+ candidates and you create new evaluation process for different levels
examples: Train Senior Staff members to make better architectural decisions
You mentor IC3/4/5 and help them reach the next step
